info.name: Flat Red Mastodon
info.description:
- Blue and red theme for Mastodon
- Bigger emojis in menu
- Wider columns
- Bigger font
info.additionalInfo:
V1.0

Based on "Mastodon: Flat, Dark and Colourful!" from @KindlyFire@maly.io : https://userstyles.org/styles/140852/mastodon-flat-dark-and-colourful

and "Mastodon style tweaks" from @er1n : https://userstyles.org/styles/135697/mastodon-style-tweaks
